website_summaries.verdict: An extremely well-rounded neutral running shoe with a lightweight construction.
pros: The lightweight shoe is incredibly breathable but the minimal feel of the upper doesn't make the shoe feel unstable
The Micro G foam is also super plush and provides loads of energy upon toe off
cons: Size runs small, but that's the extent of the drawbacks

customer_reviews.title: Best shoe I've ever bought
customer_reviews.text: Best shoe I've ever bought. In fact I'm getting another pair, even tho these haven't worn out yet but they are so comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: gottenlost

customer_reviews.title: I Really Dig These Shoes
customer_reviews.text: The local shoe selection is pretty slim, so I was forced to take a chance on ordering shoes online and purchased these strictly for running. Within the first two days that rule was out the window. They're super lightweight, one of the most comfortable shoes I've owned and to top it off they even look pretty good. I paid around $65 with Prime; in retrospect, considering the somewhat moderate price and qualities of the shoe, and provided size is correct upon receipt, the choice is borderline no-brainer. If they maintain well against the wear and tear, the next shoe could quite possibly this same shoe. In a new color, perhaps.
customer_reviews.author: Josh Steffen

customer_reviews.title: They dont have great shock absorption
customer_reviews.text: If you are between sizes or have any doubts go larger, they arent unwearable but they are a bit snug. They dont have great shock absorption, not bad but i have better as well. Good shoes not great. Id probably go for a slightly better pair of under Armour shoes next time.
customer_reviews.author: W. Lambert

customer_reviews.title: Fit great!
customer_reviews.text: Under armour is amoung the leaders in sports attire. I order these shoes as my second pair because my first pair had lasted me over a year and I still wear them to this day. The shoes fit as expected for US sizes and they are very comfortable shoes and durable. I wear these shoes while I work in the office or in the field, playing sports such as soccer. I will continue to buy this line of shoes if Under Armour continues to make them.
customer_reviews.author: stef

customer_reviews.title: Perform well running/hiking
customer_reviews.text: Put about 50 miles into them so far and have been loving them. Took them on a hike accidentally at Kennesaw Mountain (civil war site). Had no idea it was a 6+ mile hike to see the sites and mid way through it started pouring rain and lightning. Needless to say my feet got wet as expected but they kept up lovely and didn't lose too much traction on the wet rock like I assumed they would. Solid, will probably purchase another pair or similar when these die.
customer_reviews.author: Jared

customer_reviews.title: Potential Defect, bad fit
customer_reviews.text: The left shoe was fine, but the right shoe created an extremely painful heel blister, despite me having tough Army feet that have healed from many blisters before. So I let the blister heal, thinking it would make that skin resistant to the blister a second time, but it happened again, so I bought another pair of Under Armor, the G Assert 7, from the Px, and so far so good, seems I got defected pair. Pic of the blister
customer_reviews.author: Nick Cherry

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes!
customer_reviews.text: I originally found these shoes to fit somewhat small, but after wearing them in a little, they fit perfect. I have received quite a few compliments on these shoes for looks. I wore a pair of Nike tennis shoes for a couple years before these. The transition into the UA shoes was very easy. I will be buying these again after I wear these out.
customer_reviews.author: Stuart T.

customer_reviews.title: Running shoes that actually look like shoes.
customer_reviews.text: Looking for my first set of running shoes in a while, a lot of the ones I came across had this weird round profile to the tread area. I'm sure it helps with the motion of running, but I don't really care for it. This was one of the few normal looking shoes I found at Dicks Sporting Goods, and of course they didn't have them in my size. That's where amazon came in. About a year later using them off and on, they still look great and are very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: N. C. Liberg

customer_reviews.title: good shoe for the money
customer_reviews.text: I bought this shoe for outdoor walking/running and also for use at the gym (treadmill.) The size seems to run a big large, I normally wear a 9.5mens (US) and these shoes seem a bit longer in the toe than a normal 9.5. No big deal, the rest of the shoe has a nice fit. But that's the reason this is only a 4 star review. I have no real complaints about the performance of the shoe. It's light and seems pretty durable, I would know since I am very hard on shoes/boots and most of my footwear lasts only 6-10 months before sole separation, rips, tears and such.
customer_reviews.author: Edward H

customer_reviews.title: Under Armour shoes
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes! Very lightweight and comfortable shoes. Under Armour makes the best shoes and are my new go to. I have two pairs. My original pair was purchased four years ago and they are still going strong. My newest pair (this pair from this review) is holding up equally as well. Can't go wrong with this brand unless you order a pair expecting a regular size. Be sure to read the other reviews and you will find you need to adjust the size you choose. My pair I adjusted about a half size up from what I normally purchase with other brands.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Order half size larger. Nice shoes
customer_reviews.text: My son chose this pair of shoes over another pair of running shoes. He typically wears a size 9.5 and I followed the advice of other reviewers and ordered a 10 instead and the fit was just right for him. They fit well in the length and the width. He usually wears an average width and they fit fine. He likes the color and look of the shoes. He doesn't like anything too flashy and this particular shoe is a winner in every way. I have another son who bought UA shoes and they lasted 2 years. I hope these will last just as long.
customer_reviews.author: Sentrisity

customer_reviews.title: Awesome shoes!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are great! I got them for my fiancé since he is really rough on shoes. There are also limited options for anything in a size 15 wide. These have held up better than any shoes he has had. He also complains so much less about his body hurting after a long day of football coaching. The really support him.
customer_reviews.author: yoga momma

customer_reviews.title: Runs 1/4 size small, great for short runs and cross-training
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE 2 YEARS LATER: Best shoes I ever bought, especially for the price. The tread is now nearly gone but they've held up great. I'm ordering new shoes right now and am getting the same. 3 MONTH AFTER REVIEW: I'm a snug 13 and always wish there were more 13.5 shoes. Well, luckily this shoe runs about 1/4 small, so it fits PERFECT! If you are a 13.5 go for the 14 size :-) Love the comfort, breathability, look and all. I use the for 1-3 mile runs and crossfit and wanted something that I could use for both
customer_reviews.author: Derek

customer_reviews.title: The only change I would recommend is more availability of D and E sizes
customer_reviews.text: I normally wear a size 10 wide but I had to order a size 11 for these since they were only available in my size at normal width. The 11s fit perfectly though and running in them is outstanding. The only change I would recommend is more availability of D and E sizes.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Bowling

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Shoes for Running/Lifting
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes. They're made well and you can feel it. Bought 3 pairs of them. It's too bad UA keeps changing their shoes so quickly - just like TV manufacturers - always trying to hook you to the "latest and greatest" model.. I'd wear these for the rest of my life but they'll no doubt be impossible to find here any day now.
customer_reviews.author: mrbliss72

customer_reviews.title: These are great for outdoor and indoor running
customer_reviews.text: Just be sure you Google a Under Armor shoe size to inches (or centimeters) before you order! Besides that these shoes fit extremely well, they seemed a little tight but I have hard time correctly choosing running shoes. These are great for outdoor and indoor running, just dont step in puddles xP
customer_reviews.author: ARIMIL

customer_reviews.title: love the brand
customer_reviews.text: He loves them. I love underarmous shoes. I would never steer away from Nike bc all other brands sucked. He had new balance and nike's. I bought him these and he loves them. I buy the training tennis shoes when I do heavy cardio. I didn't realize I needed a diff type of shoe other than running when I did cardio like that.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Allen

customer_reviews.title: Really comfortable but they've got two holes on the side not ...
customer_reviews.text: Really comfortable but they've got two holes on the side not even in the sole, less than six months after purchase. I only do walking and really not use them to their fullest extent, so to have them wear out in this way is a big disappointment. I am questioning the workmanship, and doubt I will buy shoes from Under Armour again.
customer_reviews.author: BoMkhabela

customer_reviews.title: Stability
customer_reviews.text: This is my 2nd pair I have bought, I keep one at work and one at home so I don't have to travel with them, they have to be one of the best all round gym shoes I have owned. I wear them 8 x a week great for circuits box jumps mountain climbs etc and a good solid base for squats, Haven't run in them as I use a dedicated trainer for that.
customer_reviews.author: Simon S.

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Good
customer_reviews.text: I first bought these shoes years ago from Dick's Sporting Goods when Under Armour started introducing shoes. This is perhaps the fourth iteration of this particular shoes - and I'm never going back to anything else! The fit, stability, lightweight...my preference over any other brands for working out, running, hard court tennis. Though, the sole and mesh material get worn out rather quickly if you run on pavements or hard terrain like gravel, unlike the all-terrains line from New Balance.
customer_reviews.author: Derick B

customer_reviews.title: this brand is starting to replace my favorite athletic shoes that I have worn for over 10+ ...
customer_reviews.text: Just what I was looking for, a new workout shoe these are the second pair of Under Armour shoes I have purchased for myself and I have no complaints, this brand is starting to replace my favorite athletic shoes that I have worn for over 10+ years since I don't wear them for long periods of time I can't gauge how these would hold up material wise, but they seem to be a sturdy shoe, I have ankle problems and these were comfortable from the first wear.
customer_reviews.author: CrazyCatLady7

customer_reviews.title: They're very comfortable, fit as expected
customer_reviews.text: My 18 year old son loves these shoes. He wears a size 15 so it's hard to find much variety that big. He has these in 2 different colors and loves them. They're very comfortable, fit as expected, and are lasting well.
customer_reviews.author: A Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Very cozy running shoes!
customer_reviews.text: I've always worn size 11.5 and ordered these as such; they fit perfectly. One of the most comfortable pair of shoes I've ever owned, definitely good running shoes. They are fairly light weight, not as light as a feather but they feel fine. I will try to make these last as long as possible; I've only owned for a couple months now and they are holding together just fine.
customer_reviews.author: The Kansas City Wildcat

customer_reviews.title: Husbands first pair of Under Armour and he said there's ...
customer_reviews.text: Husbands first pair of Under Armour and he said there's a lot of support. He was having heal pains in some older shoes that needed replaced and thought we would change it up and check out another brand. He runs, lifts weights and just wears leisurely.
customer_reviews.author: Angie

customer_reviews.title: Great athletic shoes!
customer_reviews.text: These are great shoes! I've used them in the gym for lifting, treadmill and stationary bike. They are lightweight but provide good traction. The fit was right on target too. Under armor is just a great brand!
customer_reviews.author: Gary Lowe

customer_reviews.title: Great all around Shoe
customer_reviews.text: So far this has been a great shoe! I ordered a 14 Wide and the fit was just a tad to narrow but I still wear them all the time with no issues or discomfort. They are light and the insole is pretty comfy. If they don’t fall apart I’m sure I will put some serious miles on these shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Waters

customer_reviews.title: Perfect running shoes husband loves it
customer_reviews.text: This is the first time my husband is really happy with his running shoes, so I recommend it, the fit is right to size and comfortable since the first time he put it on, he never complaint with them they are just perfect for his daily workout. Planing to get more colors.
customer_reviews.author: Caroline Tucker

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable shoes
customer_reviews.text: My husband like so many people has made UNDER ARMOUR his new brand of clothing and athletic shoes. As long as he loves them then I will continue to buy them for him. He isn't that hard to please.
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda Holle

customer_reviews.title: Add at least a half size to your normal size.
customer_reviews.text: Good lightweight shoe that I use to walk. Comfortable, but glad I ordered a half size large. If not done, would have had to return. Be sure to add at least a half size to normal shoe size.
customer_reviews.author: kwcbones

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: First pair of UA shoes, have been wearing them for about a month and really like them. Not as cushioned as my Ascics cumulus shoes but these offer a lower ride and still have decent cushioning and support. No sizing issues, bought my usual 11.5 and they fit fine even despite an oversized big toe on one foot. Hope they hold up well, if so will be a really good value.
customer_reviews.author: bill

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes!
customer_reviews.text: Under Armour shoes are the best for my 11 year old. They last longer than other top brands, great quality shoe. The only reason we have to buy a new pair is because he outgrows them.
customer_reviews.author: Mel T.

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable and look great
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and look great, but didn't make it a whole year. Some of this I know is due to my boy being hard on things and he plays hard as well, but for the price it sure would be nice if they would last long enough for him to outgrow them.
customer_reviews.author: Shara Goodrich

customer_reviews.title: Great workout shoe
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this shoe for my workouts in the gym. My first UA shoe. Very light and airy. Great traction. Very comfortable with my wide feet. I will never go back to Nike or New Balance or Reebok as long as this thing is around!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bring great support.
customer_reviews.text: Don't tale me wrong, this are very nice to wear and bring a solid support to the fit, running or walking, now I made the mistake too mane has made and I ordered my same number when all previous feedbacks recommend to order half over, I thing and agree that underarmour have some type of issues with the measurement of shoes sixe. Beside that are awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Michel

customer_reviews.title: Crowds my toes a bit, otherwise comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are pretty comfortable for running. The left shoe crowds my toes a bit, but then again I have weird feet. It's hard for me to find shoes that are good enough.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Bauer

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe but check your stores first
customer_reviews.text: The shoe itself is really nice, comfortable, and stylish. It runs about 1/2 size smaller than most shoes (I ordered a 12 and they fit perfect. I am an 11/12 in most other shoes). The shoe itself is 5 stars. I gave 4 out of bitterness that right after I ordered these shoes, I found them in the store for $15 cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: jake thomas

customer_reviews.title: GREAT buy it now
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely buy it now. Great product. The price makes it 3 times more valuable. Had shoes for 100 bucks that didn't fit as good as this pair. Easy to slide in and keep your feet secure. I bought them for work to be on feet more than 10 hours and it feels really good after even long shifts. Tried it for the sports as well- recommend anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Buying in bulk. lol.
customer_reviews.text: Super comfortable. I walk in them, run errands in them, an all day utility shoe basically. Good look, I get compliments all the time. The build looks solid, have been wearing for several weeks now, still look new. I'm going to buy more to keep them in my closet so I can always have a backup. Nothing last forever lol.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey J.

customer_reviews.title: They are very comfortable and I like they way they look
customer_reviews.text: These are just slightly smaller than the Reeboks I previously wore. I have been wearing thinner socks with these which makes them fit perfectly. They are very comfortable and I like they way they look.
customer_reviews.author: Elliott Pierce

customer_reviews.title: They're not bad, but for someone who spends 8-10 hours a ...
customer_reviews.text: They're not bad, but for someone who spends 8-10 hours a day on their feet, I'm not sure if these are the ones. They work great, and good quality, but they aren't as high speed / low drag as the dash RN series
customer_reviews.author: Every-day-normal-guy

customer_reviews.title: Typical great Under Armour fit and quality
customer_reviews.text: Typical great Under Armour fit and quality. They are the only athletic shoe I will wear now. I find them to be durable but also very lightweight. Once they wear out (if they ever wear out) I will be purchasing them again.
customer_reviews.author: Jdk541

customer_reviews.title: These are a very comfortable shoe, I love the way they feel but ...
customer_reviews.text: These are a very comfortable shoe, I love the way they feel but they do fit like a NIKE, A little smaller(not smaller than the NIKE) but I planed for that. I normally wear a 10.5 sometimes 11, with NIKE I can wear an 11 to 11.5. I purchased the Under Armour in size 11 and they are perfect. Very happy
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good to go!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are perfect in both fit and support. I put in about 7 miles a day. Even though they are designated as running shoes they perform more like trainers that are good to run in. Love them.
customer_reviews.author: Wanda

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded my expectations!
customer_reviews.text: First time purchase of Under Armour shoes - exceeded my expectations! The fit as expected, are super comfortable and provide exceptional support!
customer_reviews.author: Unity Gain

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: They fit as expected...this is my third pair of Under armour running shoes. Seem to be consistent and have great support and cushioning. Also they last longer than Nikes or Adidas, at least in my opinion. Good value. The Amazon prices were even lower than the "outlet store" at Arundel Mills.
customer_reviews.author: Darren Haitmanek

customer_reviews.title: Good looking shoe
customer_reviews.text: Very lightweight and comfortable. Bought these for casual wear and not so much as an athletic shoe so for my purpose they are great.
customer_reviews.author: J L Morris

customer_reviews.title: As Expected!
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. I think I saw in the description that the shoes were supposed to be "Wide", they weren't really. This worked out fine for me though because I was just looking for a normal sized shoe not a wide one. Otherwise, comfortable and stylish.
customer_reviews.author: Helpful Guy

customer_reviews.title: good comfortable shoe for everyday work use
customer_reviews.text: got these for my dad and he really likes them. He finds them super comfortable but complains about the shoe smelling after each use. He tried using different brand socks and stuff but the shoe had a weird smell from them from day 1, but besides that he thinks its a great shoe!
customer_reviews.author: zuhair

customer_reviews.title: Good but.....
customer_reviews.text: Good shoe but tongue is a little small if your foot is wider. This shoe seems to have a narrower arch then most. Laces too short to lace all the holes. Probably will look for a different shoe next time.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Great Value Running Shoe
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight, fit true to size, seem very durable. As comfortable as my NB993's at a great discount. Definitely recommend & I will buy again. Perfect as a cross-trainer as well.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good shoe, wish the soles were softer.
customer_reviews.text: Shoe fit really well and looks great but I feel like the soles do not have much cushion in them. I would have liked UnderArmour use the 4d foam sole, it provides much better cushion. Great price as well!
customer_reviews.author: Randall

customer_reviews.title: Good arch support Comfortable Look good Cons
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Good arch support Comfortable Look good Cons: Relatively hard to clean the side mesh (Understandably) I've put at least 40 miles on mine so far and they still feel great Notes: They are slimmer than normal sizes
customer_reviews.author: Trenton

customer_reviews.title: Shoes are sturdy, have worn them daily for roughly a year
customer_reviews.text: Shoes are sturdy, have worn them daily for roughly a year, and have not worn a hole in the some yet. Very comfortable, use them for pretty much everything, unless I want steel toes.
customer_reviews.author: Ross

customer_reviews.title: Now they are fairly comfortable. If I wear them for a long time ...
customer_reviews.text: It took a week to break in. Before that, the arch felt really high on the left side of the right foot and it was uncomfortable around my ankles. Now they are fairly comfortable. If I wear them for a long time my feet will start to get hot, which is something I've never experienced with shoes before.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Inconsistent sizing within brand
customer_reviews.text: My wife had a pair of under armour sneakers already, so we bought these in the same size as her previous pair. Somehow these were way shorter than the others. Her toes are pressed against the tip of the shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Gretchen L.

customer_reviews.title: Be wary of  Narrow tongues
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable shoe. The only problem that I have is the tongue is too narrow. When I put on the shoe almost every time I have to stick my finger in the shoe to spread the tongue out.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Held up well
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had these shoes for almost a year and they have held up very well. The shoe still is comfortable and supports well I would definitely buy these again
customer_reviews.author: paul

customer_reviews.title: Great fit. Only problem is that it gave me ...
customer_reviews.text: Great fit. Only problem is that it gave me a callous I’m having a terrible time getting rid of. Despite that I’d buy them again. Great workout/running shoes
customer_reviews.author: Wil Zuniga

customer_reviews.title: Light and DURABLE!
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my 14 year old son who is very hard on shoes, usually the toev rubber starts to peel away. He has worn these every day for 3 months and so far holding up better than any other athletic shoe we've tried! Lightweight, looks nice, true to size.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: UA shoes are for winners!!!
customer_reviews.text: First pair of UA shoes and they are awesome . Fitwise and they function at a level higher than any other shoes I have tried. Plus the shoe string fits the shoe . Good Job !!!
customer_reviews.author: Charlie Combs

customer_reviews.title: I gave it a good week at work before I considered them to be ...
customer_reviews.text: I have found THE SHOE! I am not even kidding when I say I have tried everything to relieve the pain in my foot. Expensive shoes, inserts, wraps, pads...nothing worked. Then I decided to try Under Armour shoes. I gave it a good week at work before I considered them to be the best thing that has happened to my feet in a long time. I know everybody is different but for me, these are it!
customer_reviews.author: Christa Babb

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Running Shoes!
customer_reviews.text: My favorite pair of tennis shoes. I will be getting another pair of Under Armour Shoes soon, nothing makes you want to workout like a nice pair of shoes to keep you comfy while you are doing it!
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Only shoes I have ever bought twice
customer_reviews.text: These are the best running shoes I have ever owned. I often get a splitting sensation under my feet while I run long distances. When I run with these shoes that pain never comes.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: comfortable
customer_reviews.text: very good shoe, i use it for walking mostly and it feels great. lots of support. just a little bit narrow hope it will strecth out. great shoes, will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: armsimle

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my brother-in-law for his secret santa gift. He is obsessed with them! He has thanked me for them on multiple occasions and raves about them all the time!
customer_reviews.author: Reviewer G

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable running shoe
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes that fit really well. Only thing I don't like is they seem to fall apart after six months or so. But they have done really well and are really comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Large shoe/good fit!
customer_reviews.text: These were a B-day pressie for our son. He wears a 14 wide, and it can be a challenge to readily find that size. He said they fit well, and are comfortable to wear when he works out. He's happy, so we're happy, too.
customer_reviews.author: Sawdusterman

customer_reviews.title: Great sneakers but run a bit on the small side.
customer_reviews.text: If I had bought the usual size my husband wears they would have been too small. We decided on buying a 1/2 size larger based on the other reviews. They fit perfectly and are super comfortable. We decided on the navy and are both pleased with the look. My favorite looking sneakers he has owned by far. He agrees.
customer_reviews.author: lestill

customer_reviews.title: I decided to give them a try since I know under armor is a good brand. Right off the bat they fit perfectly ...
customer_reviews.text: I usually buy $150-$200 sneakers, but when I saw how cheap these sneakers where at $41, I decided to give them a try since I know under armor is a good brand. Right off the bat they fit perfectly I ordered a size 11 1/2 I don’t know why some people are commenting to order a size bigger they look and feel like premium sneakers, I would definitely buy from them again.
customer_reviews.author: Luis Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Good shoe
customer_reviews.text: I like these shoes, they fit as expected. I've had them for over a month and they're pretty comfortable but not sure if the are as comfortable as previous purchased Nike running shoes. They're a good looking shoe in grey.
customer_reviews.author: AEM

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoe
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe! Just as expected! This is review is crazy though.. making me add more words just to post it... lol. How many words can you say about a shoe? It's good.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie

customer_reviews.title: So far so good, but the last pair of UA shoes I ...
customer_reviews.text: So far so good, but the last pair of UA shoes I had didn't hold up very well (the soles broke down pretty fast, making them hot to wear).
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: I wish I could give them 6 stars.
customer_reviews.text: These are one the best pair of sneakers I've purchased in a long time. They fit perfectly and very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: T. H.

customer_reviews.title: Shoes ok
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are okay but do not fit or feel like the Under Armour shoes I have bought in the past. I would not buy them again
customer_reviews.author: Terry

customer_reviews.title: Repeat Buy
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable. Functional. This is our second pair of these shoes (thanks to our dog). They hold up well to life, and they're comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Lynne Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Athletic Shoes
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these shoes for my son. He was able to wear them on the first day he had them with no problems in comfort. He chose the grey color, and the shoes look reasonable.
customer_reviews.author: Marjie, Mother of 9Top Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Great Fit.
customer_reviews.text: My son wears a size 14 and it is hard to find shoes that don't make his feet look like boats but these make his feet look normal. They are comfortable and he wears them all day and through sports practice and work out.
customer_reviews.author: Kel

customer_reviews.title: A bit short
customer_reviews.text: They run a little small, order a half size larger. Good looking shoe, my son thinks they're great looking.
customer_reviews.author: funformom

customer_reviews.title: The shoe has a nasty smell, after three days from wearing it
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure if the seller didn't sell me an authentic Under Armour or if all the company's products smell this horrible, I usually wear Asics, and I work my shoes out, but none of them ever smelled as bad as this brand new Under Armour. Again, It might be just the pair that I got. but definitely not trying my chances out with Under Armour ever again.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THEM
customer_reviews.text: I bought and have been wearing these shoes for a few months .. They are very comfortable , High quality and look great .. If you are on your feet all day or just using them to work out .. i feel you will enjoy these shoes ..
customer_reviews.author: RJC

customer_reviews.title: Great running shoes
customer_reviews.text: Have had for about 2 weeks have ran a 5k and a total of about 15 miles with them so far so good love the fit and seem well made
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: By a size larger
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes but UA shoes are always small. I typically wear a men's 12 and needed to buy a 13.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffery

customer_reviews.title: Sizes differ
customer_reviews.text: Look great, but sizes differ from any other shoe size that you will refer too. Better to buy it in stores than online.
customer_reviews.author: Sumit Joshi

customer_reviews.title: Super Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: These sneakers are perfect!! My husband says they are super comfortable and they look great on him. The build of the shoe isn't chunky like a lot of men's shoes so they are great for athletics but also look great with jeans and shorts.
customer_reviews.author: C. Settle

customer_reviews.title: Top-Notch Footwear
customer_reviews.text: These were purchased for a teenager who is on-trend and athletic. He is very picky about comfort, like everyone, and wears these shoes to school all day. Under Armour quality is unbeatable in the footwear department.
customer_reviews.author: Buffy

customer_reviews.title: Shoes fit great!
customer_reviews.text: Can’t take the insoles out as they are glued in.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Kancsar

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoe
customer_reviews.text: I have been buying this show for a while now (in different colors) and it's very comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Brian Parr

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, but with quality issues.
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are very comfortable, breathe well and look nice initially. Unfortunately, some of the black coating (on the small strip of rubber between the white sole section and where the mesh begins) started flaking off after only a couple months. I wear these shoes daily, but I think they should last quite a bit longer than that before quality issues start popping up.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel C

customer_reviews.title: VERY UNCOMFORTABLE!!!
customer_reviews.text: I'll never buy these shoes again, and most likely not this brand again. They constantly hurt my feet!!! Unlike any other shoe discomfort, I can only point to a poor shoe design.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Kistler

customer_reviews.title: I love these shoes besides the tongue
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes besides the tongue. That can move too much. Other than that, great pair of shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Cal

customer_reviews.title: Very firm, light weight, and fairly stable. ...
customer_reviews.text: Very firm, light weight, and fairly stable. A bit loud if running on a treadmill. Also, wear taller socks if running, the back rubs above no shows.
customer_reviews.author: Drewsuf3

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes but I meant to purchase women’s so shoes are loose around the ankles
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My husband uses these for work and the last pair ...
customer_reviews.text: My husband uses these for work and the last pair lasted 2 years, so, those are the only ones he want to get.
customer_reviews.author: springtime

customer_reviews.title: don't be fooled by the low price. These are good.
customer_reviews.text: unexpectedly really like these shoes. Bought because the price was low. These are comfortable, and have lasted.
customer_reviews.author: Porter

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes, couldn't be happier!
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes, great fit, quick shipping. I would definitely recommend buying these shoes!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable shoe and its not hard to look at
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable shoe and its not hard to look at. So far theyve served me well at the gym and on flat even terrain. Im generally a trail runner but ive reserved this pair for the gym and paved roads. chicks totaly dig em ;)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoes but for flat feet look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.text: These shoes look very nice, lots of ventilation and would be very comfortable for those without flat feet. Considering changing the soles to flat foot special soles, but they are also a bit tight around the front of the foot before the toes. Compared to shoes of the same size they fit a bit small.
customer_reviews.author: That'll Do Pig That'll Do

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: POOR SUPORT IN SIDE AND ARCH. ASICS BETTER QUALITY. THESE SHOES ALL STYLE, NO SUBSTANCE.
customer_reviews.author: dirk diggler/jack mayhoffer

customer_reviews.title: GREAT SHOE!!
customer_reviews.text: These things are comfy! I got somewhat high arches and to in soles are great. I wont need to buy arch support insoles.
customer_reviews.author: kenia

customer_reviews.title: I like them, but somewhat smaller than the NewBalance I ...
customer_reviews.text: I like them, but somewhat smaller than the NewBalance I usually buy. I will buy a half size bigger next time
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Under Armour Men's Micro G Assert 6 Running Shoe
product_meta.description: Upper uses light, supportive foam underneath a soft layer of breathable mesh. Durable leather overlays for stability that locks in your midfoot. Full-length EVA sockliner for added comfort & a custom fit. Full-length Micro G foam turns cushioned landings into explosive takeoffs. Strategically placed rubber traction covers high impact zones for greater durability with less weight . Non-marking rubber outsole delivers greater traction with less weight. Offset: 10 mm. Weight: 9.2 oz.
feature_bullets: Shaft measures approximately low-top from arch
Upper uses light, supportive foam underneath a soft layer of breathable mesh
Durable leather overlays for stability that locks in your midfoot
Full length EVA sockliner for added comfort & a custom fit
Full length Micro G foam turns cushioned landings into explosive takeoffs
Strategically placed rubber traction covers high impact zones for greater durability with less weight
